review_data.title: Mrs
review_data.content: Coke was warm, pulled beef sandwich did not have any beef in it at all, salad was packed in paper bag without fork, bread roll not fresh but dry, quite disapointing the hitzbeeger experience

review_data.title: Simply the best fast-food i visited
review_data.content: Second time I buy from this warm welcoming little « fast-food ». The food is very tasty, very fresh, the service is super kind and smiling, all so lovely actually that one does not think it is a « fast-food ». Bravo

review_data.title: Slowest service in zurich
review_data.content: This is basically a fast food place with sandwiches, salads, juices and coffee. The worst place to go if you are in a hurry (mornings). Many people work here however, the service is so incredibly slow. When you open a joint in a train station...More

review_data.title: Quick and decent sandwiches, but there is better food around
review_data.content: Grabbed a falafel wrap here while running to a train, and service was quick and efficient. The falafel was chilly and tough and the sandwich relied heavily on mayonnaise and, bizarrely although not unpleasantly, pomegranate seeds. It cost over 12 francs, which for an acceptable...More

review_data.title: Decent take away curry at Zurich HB Station

review_data.title: The healthy version of Take-away
review_data.content: If you want a quick but healthy lunch while passing through Zürich HB search for Hitzberger in the ShopVille (underground area). It's good a variety of ready made things, as well as soup and deserts. And, always a great choice of glutenfree, vegetarian dishes.

review_data.title: Perfect
review_data.content: One of the nicest restaurants I ever encountered. We were in Zurich connecting trains and needed some sandwiches and coffee and the restaurant was the answer. Very delicious food in a very needed time.
